title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 

(Minister of State at the Department of Transport) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department transport) order 2025

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: 2. Pádraig Hughes, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Pádraig Hughes, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Transport, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to 
Seán Canney, Minister of State at the Department of Transport, with effect from 
4 February 2025.
text_norm: 2 padraig hughes particular whose address deposited office department transport appointed special adviser sean canney minister state department transport effect 4 february 2025

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: 3. Angelina Nugent, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
3. Angelina Nugent, particulars of whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of Transport, is appointed to be a Special Adviser 
to Seán Canney, Minister of State at the Department of Transport, with effect 
from 10 March 2025. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

10 June, 2025. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 13th June, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [288] 3
